languages.text: {n}В мелодии возникает диссонанс, аккорды скачут в ритме сердца. Но ваши ладони плотно лежат на его ладонях, пальцы сплетаются и превращают композицию в триумфальную и чувственную какофонию. На губах Соломона возникает слабая улыбка, но он не препятствует вам.{/n}

{n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В мелодии возникает диссонанс, аккорды скачут в ритме сердца. Но ваши ладони плотно лежат на его ладонях, пальцы сплетаются и превращают композицию в триумфальную и чувственную какофонию. На губах Соломона возникает слабая улыбка, но он не препятствует вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to not stop you.{/n}

A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メロディは不協和音へと変わり、心臓の高鳴りに呼応するように音符が跳ね上がった。だが、あなたと彼の手はしっかりと重なり合い、指が絡み合って、旋律は勝利と官能に満ちた混沌へと姿を変えていく。ソロモーンの唇にかすかな笑みが浮かんだが、あなたを止めようとはしなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メロディは不協和音へと変わり、心臓の高鳴りに呼応するように音符が跳ね上がった。だが、あなたと彼の手はしっかりと重なり合い、指が絡み合って、旋律は勝利と官能に満ちた混沌へと姿を変えていく。ソロモーンの唇にかすかな笑みが浮かんだが、あなたを止めようとはしなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Melodie wird unharmonisch, die Noten springen im Rhythmus deines pochenden Herzens. Aber deine und seine Hände sind eng zusammengepresst, eure Finger verschränkt, und sie machen aus dem Stück eine triumphale und sinnliche Kakofonie. Ein schwaches Lächeln erscheint auf Solomornes Lippen, aber er macht keine Anstalten, dich zu bremsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Melodie wird unharmonisch, die Noten springen im Rhythmus deines pochenden Herzens. Aber deine und seine Hände sind eng zusammengepresst, eure Finger verschränkt, und sie machen aus dem Stück eine triumphale und sinnliche Kakofonie. Ein schwaches Lächeln erscheint auf Solomornes Lippen, aber er macht keine Anstalten, dich zu bremsen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mélodie devient discordante, les notes bondissant au rythme des battements de votre cœur, mais vos mains se serrent contre les siennes et vos doigts s'entremêlent pour transformer le morceau en une cacophonie aussi triomphale que sensuelle. Un demi-sourire se dessine sur les lèvres de Solomorne, mais il ne fait rien pour vous interrompre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mélodie devient discordante, les notes bondissant au rythme des battements de votre cœur, mais vos mains se serrent contre les siennes et vos doigts s'entremêlent pour transformer le morceau en une cacophonie aussi triomphale que sensuelle. Un demi-sourire se dessine sur les lèvres de Solomorne, mais il ne fait rien pour vous interrompre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La melodía se torna discordante, las notas siguen el compás de los latidos de tu corazón. Pero tus manos aprietan con firmeza las suyas, con los dedos entrelazados, transformando la pieza en una cacofonía triunfal y sensual. Una débil sonrisa aflora a los labios de Solomorne, pero no hace nada por detenerte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La melodía se torna discordante, las notas siguen el compás de los latidos de tu corazón. Pero tus manos aprietan con firmeza las suyas, con los dedos entrelazados, transformando la pieza en una cacofonía triunfal y sensual. Una débil sonrisa aflora a los labios de Solomorne, pero no hace nada por detenerte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}音乐的旋律变得不再和谐，音符仿佛你的心跳一样砰砰作响。然而，你们两人的手紧紧贴在一起，手指缠绕，曲子的旋律也因此带上了胜利的意味，充满了感性的不和谐音。索罗蒙没有制止你，他唇角露出了一丝淡淡的笑容，继续与你一起演奏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音乐的旋律变得不再和谐，音符仿佛你的心跳一样砰砰作响。然而，你们两人的手紧紧贴在一起，手指缠绕，曲子的旋律也因此带上了胜利的意味，充满了感性的不和谐音。索罗蒙没有制止你，他唇角露出了一丝淡淡的笑容，继续与你一起演奏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uyumsuz notalara bürünen melodi, kalbinin gümbürtüsüne eşlik ediyor. Parmaklarınız sıkıca kenetleniyor, parça muvaffak ve tutkulu bir kakofoniye dönüşüyor. Solomorne'un dudaklarında hafif bir tebessüm belirirken seni durdurmaya kalkışmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The melody turns discordant, the notes leaping to the pounding of your heart. But your hands and his are pressed tightly together, your fingers intertwined, transforming the piece into a triumphant and sensual cacophony. A faint smile dawns on Solomorne's lips, but he makes no move to stop you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Melodi uyumsuz notalara bürünürken kalbinin gümbürtüsüne eşlik eder. Parmaklarınız sıkıca kenetlenir, parça muvaffak ve tutkulu bir kakofoniye dönüşür. Solomorne'un dudaklarında hafif bir tebessüm belirir, seni durdurmaya kalkışmaz.{/n}
